name: Self-efficacy Test
instructions: For each statement, indicate the degree to which you agree or disagree by choosing a number on the scale from 1 to 5.

questions.q: I am confident in my ability to achieve my goals.
I believe that I can handle difficult tasks.
I am able to stay focused and productive when faced with distractions.
I am capable of finding solutions to problems that I encounter.
I am confident in my ability to learn new things.
I believe that I can overcome obstacles that stand in my way.
I am able to manage my time effectively to accomplish my goals.
I am confident in my ability to communicate effectively with others.
I am able to make decisions with confidence and clarity.
I believe that I can handle stressful situations with ease.
